title: Elegant Diamond Bala (Diamond Bangles)
materials: brilliant-cut diamonds of VS clarity. Features a classic Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Delicate, interconnected diamond-studded links create a sleek and modern bangle. The prong setting maximizes the diamonds' brilliance. A timeless design inspired by traditional Indian aesthetics with a contemporary twist.
colors: Warm yellow gold complements the sparkling white diamonds
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Sankranti
or a sophisticated touch to evening wear. These Balas make a thoughtful gift for milestone celebrations.
description: A timeless blend of tradition and modernity. The diamonds' exceptional sparkle and gold's rich hue make it a statement piece. The smooth, comfortable fit ensures all-day wear. Represents lasting value and heirloom quality.
